custom-action.name: imported_DoubleClick GuiShell (SAP.TableTreeContro...- SM21 - system log)
custom-action.description:
This action simulates a double click action on an SAP object.
Possible parameters are: - objectId (optional): The SAP GUI object identifier. Default value is "ses[0]/". - column (optional): The column index of a table or the column name of a grid. - row (optional): The row index of a grid or a table. - nodeKey (optional): The node key of a tree. - itemName (optional): The item name of a tree. - x (optional): The x coordinate when clicking on a picture. - y (optional): The y coordinate when clicking on a picture. - ignoreErrors (optional): If set to "true", the action won't be in error if object is not found, type is not supported or an exception is thrown. Default value is "false". - windowId (optional): The SAP GUI window identifier. - objectName (optional): The SAP GUI object name. - objectType (optional): The SAP GUI object type.
